file_content.text: Defending team, welcome to the Voidstar combat simulation. Your enemies are after the ship's datacore, and you must stop them. Let the simulation begin!
The Voidstar wargame has begun! Defending team: the attackers have arrived. Treat them as you would the Republic, and block their recovery of the ship's datacore!
Welcome to the Reactor Core pit. Find a path across, and plant explosives on one of the doors. Ensure they detonate, and you're nearly there!
Excellent progress. Bridge the gap across the Reactor Core pit and place explosives on one of the doors. See that the defending team doesn't disarm them!
This is it! Access the terminal, download the Voidstar's datacore, and win the simulation!
Success is nearly yours! Access the terminal and download the Voidstar's datacore.
Isn't this fun? As the attacking team, you must retake the Voidstar's datacore. Override a security terminal to breach the first door.
Commencing stage two Voidstar wargame. Defending team: stop the attackers from seizing the datacore!
The tables have turned. Defenders: stop the attackers from retaking the Voidstar's datacore. Go team!
Commencing stage two Voidstar wargame. Attacking team: override the security terminal, open the door and retake the ship's datacore!
Your team prevails! Execution: perfect. Team work: exemplary. Voidstar scenario complete!
So close! Your defeat has been recorded, but everyone's a winner at heart. Voidstar scenario complete.
You have triumphed. May the opposing team learn from your example. Wargame complete.
The Voidstar falls to the enemy. Your defeat is noted. Wargame complete.
Good luck claiming the datacore. Let the simulation begin!
Commencing wargame. Seize that datacore!
The attackers have advanced to the Reactor Core pit! Stop them before they blow open the doors with explosives. If they plant a bomb, disarm it!
Attackers have breached the Reactor Core pit. They plan to blow open the doors with explosives. Halt their advance and disarm any bombs before they explode!
The enemy has nearly won, but you can still triumph! Shield the datacore access terminal from the attackers.
You are on the verge of defeat! Guard the datacore access terminal with your life.
Alert! Attackers have breached the cargo bay. Neutralize their assault and disarm any explosives they rig on the doors.
You've stormed the cargo bay! Bypass the force field, rig a door with explosives, and guard the bomb until it detonates!
Look out--attackers in the cargo bay! Block their attack, and disarm any explosives they plant on the doors. You can do it!
Wonderful, you've reached the cargo bay! Bypass the force field, and blast open a door with explosives. Don't let the defending team disarm your handiwork.
